member.name: IDWriteLocalizedStrings.FindLocaleName
member.summary: Gets the zero-based index of the locale name/string pair with the specified locale name.
member.param: A null-terminated array of characters containing the locale name to look for.
The zero-based index of the locale name/string pair. This method initializes index to UINT_MAX.
When this method returns, contains TRUE if the locale name exists; otherwise, FALSE. This method initializes exists to FALSE.
member.returns: If the specified locale name does not exist, the return value is S_OK, but index is UINT_MAX and exists is FALSE.

member.name: IDWriteLocalizedStrings.GetCount
member.summary: Gets the number of language/string pairs.

member.name: IDWriteLocalizedStrings.GetLocaleName
member.summary: Copies the locale name with the specified index to the specified array.
member.param: Zero-based index of the locale name to be retrieved.

When this method returns, contains a character array, which is null-terminated, that receives the locale name from the language/string pair. The buffer allocated for this array must be at least the size of size, in element count.
The size of the array in characters. The size must include space for the terminating null character.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteLocalizedStrings.GetLocaleNameLength
member.summary: Gets the length in characters (not including the null terminator) of the locale name with the specified index.
member.param: Zero-based index of the locale name to be retrieved.
When this method returns, contains the length in characters of the locale name, not including the null terminator.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteLocalizedStrings.GetString
member.summary: Copies the string with the specified index to the specified array.
member.param: The zero-based index of the language/string pair to be examined.

The null terminated array of characters that receives the string from the language/string pair. The buffer allocated for this array should be at least the size of size. can be used to get the size of the array before using this method.
The size of the array in characters. The size must include space for the terminating null character. can be used to get the size of the array before using this method.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteLocalizedStrings.GetStringLength
member.summary: Gets the length in characters (not including the null terminator) of the string with the specified index.
member.param: A zero-based index of the language/string pair.
The length in characters of the string, not including the null terminator, from the language/string pair.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteLocalizedStrings
member.summary: Represents a collection of strings indexed by locale name.
